Illuvium Creature Fusion Calculator

Description:

The Illuvium Creature Fusion Calculator is an advanced tool designed for players of the Illuvium game who want to predict and optimize stat outcomes when fusing three Illuvials. This extension helps users simulate the fusion process by calculating the possible stat outcomes of evolving creatures and displaying these results through intuitive radar charts.

Key Features:

Stat Customization: Input desired stats for the evolved creature and the stats of the base Illuvials to analyze potential fusion outcomes.
Preset Configurations: Quickly populate the stats for balanced, offensive, or defensive setups for both base Illuvials and desired creatures.

Fusion Simulation: Calculate the most probable, middle case, best case, and worst case scenarios for fusion results.

Reroll Functionality: Reroll the most probable and middle-case outcomes to explore other possibilities and fine-tune your strategy.

Fusion Feedback: Receive detailed feedback on how close the fused creature's stats match the recommended stats, with an overall performance rating (Excellent, Good, Needs Improvement).

Advanced Probability Breakdown: Get a detailed probability breakdown for achieving your desired stats based on the inputted Illuvial stats.

Multiple Rerolls: Evaluate different potential outcomes of fusion with multiple reroll options to explore various scenarios.

Visual Output: Beautiful radar charts display the results, making it easy to visualize and compare potential outcomes.
